name: greydient - Lost in the Light (with dilip)

metadata.description:
You know that feeling when you’re up in the middle of the night; when your mind is wandering and you arrive at a cold clarity about something that’s been bothering you? But the sun rises the next day and that clarity has entirely dissipated, lost to the light…

dilip:
greydient and I kept running into each other in multiple discords in late 2021 and a friendship was quickly born. I sent him a rough demo for a song idea. Since then, we’ve experienced Songcamp’s Camp Chaos together, performed at NFT NYC together, and now finally turned the demo into a song together. 

greydient:
I remember getting this song idea from dilip while I was in Austin at CabinDAO’s node 0. I knew that there was something to this song, but not sure how I could fit my style into it. It wasn’t until I got back home to Toronto and pulled up the song during Xmas holidays that the magic began. I infused a little of the Toronto darkness into dilip’s original idea and the rest you’ll get to hear on the song. 

This drop is just the start of a musical history together. If you want to know what else we’ve got cooking up our sleeves, you definitely want to get tapped in.

lyrics.text:
VERSE 1
I can tell that it’s the way that you feel 
You don’t have to ignore it
If you let me then I’ll take it from here 
I’ll take the weight off your shoulders 
Catch you on the outside
Just tell me if it hurts when you’re not mine
Not over thinking it’s the way you feel
It’s just the way that you feel yeah

CHORUS
Heavy on my heart tonight
I’ve emptied out all of my pride
So I’ll just pick up the pieces
And pretend I found peace with us
I’m lost in the light

VERSE 2
I just wanna let go
You can’t take my breath no more
It’s typical for me to think that I’m the one to blame
But you’re the one who told me that you needed me
Until you bored of us and picked a change of scenery
Lying, deceiving, was it just a game
You kept it going so who is to blame 

CHORUS
Heavy on my heart tonight
I’ve emptied out all of my pride
So I’ll just pick up the pieces
And pretend I found peace with us
I’m lost in the light
Heavy on my heart tonight
I’ve emptied out all of my pride
So I’ll just pick up the pieces
And pretend I found peace with us
I’m lost in the 

OUTRO
[Light]
Hazy illusions, my delusions of a future state
In my confusion I relapsed to wishing that you would stay
But it’s proven time and time again that this was fake
Mmmm I’m sure that this was fate

Now I’m leaving I got nothing left to prove
I'll break into a run don't bother to pursue
Stop chasing the ghost of you
Fresh eyes I take off my noose

Just a mirage ain’t it
Pretty facade painted
Over the true you and me
The end was postdated

Just a mirage ain’t it
Pretty facade painted
Over the true you and me
The end was postdated

[raag]
